p: The average of daily individual achieved intake of AOCED in mg/kg body weight per week, calculated based on daily food consumption and weekly body weight measurements, was overall dose proportional during all phases of the study: the gestation and the lactation in dams and the growth phase in puppies ( Table 8). The achieved AOCED intake in the mid-dose group was ~250, 640 and 440 mg/kg body weight/day during the gestation, the lactation, and the growth phase, respectively ( Table 8).
